keyFacts: The document details account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for May 2018.
Significant outgoing transfers include payments to George Britain Land Design Inc.
The ending balance of the account as of May 31, 2018, is $562,229.38.
There are multiple preauthorized debits for payroll and utility payments.
Steuart Oldfield is listed as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
